sentences.en: A changing world has put pressures on the company.
sentences.cn: 日新月异的世界使这家公司感到了压力。

sentences.en: Doctors are complaining about being barraged by drug-company salesmen.
sentences.cn: 医生们抱怨他们疲于应付医药公司的销售人员。

sentences.en: he feels at ease in company.
sentences.cn: 他和别人在一起时毫不拘束。

sentences.en: He glanced around at the assembled company .
sentences.cn: 他向全体人群扫了一眼。

sentences.en: He has had to eat his words about the company being recession-proof.
sentences.cn: 他不得不收回他说过的公司能免受经济衰退影响的话。

sentences.en: I called the phone company about the bill.
sentences.cn: 我就电话账单的事给电话公司打了电话。

sentences.en: If the company was to relocate, most employees would move.
sentences.cn: 如果这个公司要搬迁，多数员工也要搬家。

sentences.en: Its profits are rising four times faster than the average company.
sentences.cn: 它的利润增长速度比一般公司快4倍。

sentences.en: People judge you by the company you keep (= the people you spend time with ) .
sentences.cn: 人们根据你交往的朋友来判断你的为人。

sentences.en: she began keeping company with a real estate developer.
sentences.cn: 她开始与一个房地产开发商亲密交往。

sentences.en: she began keeping company with a real estate developer.
sentences.cn: 她开始与一个房地产开发商亲密交往。

sentences.en: The company directors have awarded themselves a massive pay increase.
sentences.cn: 公司的董事们给自己大幅加薪。

sentences.en: The company has had to make redundancy payments of £472 million.
sentences.cn: 该公司不得不为裁员支付4.72亿英镑的补偿款。

sentences.en: The company has made heroic efforts at cost reduction.
sentences.cn: 公司在降低成本方面付出了艰苦卓绝的努力。

sentences.en: The company I work for went through a rough patch.
sentences.cn: 我所在的公司经历了一段困难时期。

sentences.en: The company manufactures a range of innovative light-weight cycles.
sentences.cn: 这家公司生产一系列的新型轻便自行车。

sentences.en: The company put on a play about the homeless.
sentences.cn: 这家剧团上演了一出讲述无家可归者的戏。

sentences.en: The company treated me as though I were skiving.
sentences.cn: 公司对待我的态度就好像是我上班时溜号了似的。

sentences.en: The company was coasting on the enormous success of its early products.
sentences.cn: 公司凭借早期产品的巨大成功而在市场上遥遥领先。

sentences.en: The company was set up just after the war.
sentences.cn: 这家公司是战后不久成立的。

sentences.en: The two men enjoy each other’s company .
sentences.cn: 这两个人喜欢在一起。

sentences.en: the US dollar went through a bad patch in 1986, in company with the oil market.
sentences.cn: 1986年，美元和石油行情一起大跌。

sentences.en: This, after all, is a company which is awash with cash.
sentences.cn: 这毕竟是一家现金充裕的公司。

sentences.en: We’re expecting company this evening.
sentences.cn: 今晚我们有客人要来。

sentences.en: What are your plans for the development of your company?
sentences.cn: 你打算怎样来发展壮大自己的公司？

sentences.en: Which company do you work for?
sentences.cn: 你在哪家公司上班？

sentences.en: Who wants to buy a computer from a failing company?
sentences.cn: 谁愿意从一家要倒闭的公司买计算机呢？

words.tran_cn: 好交往的；友善的；适于做朋友的
伙伴的，同伴的；友爱的，友好的

phrases.tran_cn: [用于人名后表示与之交往的人或与之有来往的人]
和…一样重要；像…一样受尊敬
公司简介；公司概况；企业介绍
陪伴某人；使某人不感孤独（或无聊）
与…亲密交往；与…形影不离
有限公司；（英）股份有限公司（等于limited-liability company）
上市公司，股票上市的公司

trans.tran_cn: 公司，商号，剧团，连队，陪伴，宾客，在一起的一群人
trans.tran_en: a business organization that makes or sells goods or services
